Testing¶

Code¶

Testing the code:

$ make test-code

You can also use pytest:

$ pytest clover -v

Coverage¶

Test the coverage of the code:

$ make test-coverage

Documentation¶

Test the documentation examples:

$ make test-doc

All¶

Run all tests code:

$ make test
